p.e:
In Hello Kingdoms, infantry are
basic, non-vehicle units, such as
miners and soldiers.
They can move in any direction
on the ground, and can make any
number of turns during their
movement.
Infantry can move up to their
SPD in distance, and deal damage
equal to their ATK when damaging
other units, unless they have an
ability which states otherwise.

When an infantry unit dies, place a
gravestone at its location, and put
a mini version of the unit on it, 
unless the unit cannot be revived
(e.g. if it has already died or its
card states that it cannot be
revived).
Revive-able units can be revived by
units with the ability to do do.
